title: Bread And Poetry Nan O Sher ( 1994) 720p

sources.title: Bread And Poetry Nan O Sher ( 1994) 720p
sources.description: Title: Bread and Poetry - Nan o sher (1994) Directed by: Kiumars Poorahmad Date of birth: 1949, Najaf Abad, Iran Writing credits: Kiumars Poorahmad (based on "Majid's Stories by Houshang Moradi Kermani) Music: Mahmoud Samakbashi (sound) Year: 1994 Country: Iran Language: Farsi Color: Color Runtime: 90 min. Synopsis Majid writes a poem and sends it to be printed in a magazine. While waiting for the fame which will result from the appearance of his poem in the magazine, Majid comes upon a few torn pages from Victor Hugo's "Le Miserables", and becomes interested in the book. But as he is not a member of the public library, he can not borrow the book. So he takes a book from his brother-in-law's shelf and swaps it with :Les Miserables.
